name: The Eye of Zuldazar
tooltip:
The Eye of ZuldazarLevel 60

Tales of your battles against the Gurubashi are whispered in the winds, <class>. Even royalty is beginning to talk of your deeds. It is rumored that King Rastakhan even mentioned you by name.

The time has come to imbue the Eye. Hand me the talisman and I shall perform the service.

Requirements:
- The Eye of Zuldazar
